mapper.insert: insert into order (order_id, pet_id, user_id, order_quantity, order_shipDate, order_status, order_complete) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderShipdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderComplete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update order set pet_id = #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_quantity = #{orderQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_shipDate = #{orderShipdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_complete = #{orderComplete,jdbcType=BIT} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, pet_id, user_id, order_quantity, order_shipDate, order_status, order_complete from order
